content: विपुल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Large, extensive, capacious, broad, wide, spacious; विपुलं नितंबदेशे <ls>M. 3. 7</ls>; शिरसि तनुर्विपुलश्च मध्यदेशे <ls>Mk. 3. 22</ls>; कालो ह्ययं निरवधिर्विपुला च पृथ्वी <ls>Māl. 1. 6</ls>; so विपुलं पृष्ठं, विपुलः कुक्षिः &c. {@--2@} Much, ample, copious, abundant; <ls>Ki. 18. 14.</ls> {@--3@} Deep, profound; <ls>Mv. 1. 2.</ls> {@--4@} With the hair standing on end, thrilling; <ls>Śi. 16. 3</ls> (where it has sense 1 also). --लः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the mountain Meru. {@--2@} Of Himālaya. {@--3@} A respectable man.
